author: ian_dickinson
msg: Omit copying CVS files in copy-source-tree target

author: ian_dickinson
msg: New utility that can join a number of input RDF files (or stdin) into a single model, and perform the same format translations as rdfcopy. This utility also uses FileManager to resolve files, allowing for flexible redirection to local copies etc.

author: ian_dickinson
msg: Factored out behaviours for ending processing of args on command line and handling unrecognised args, to allow sub-classes more flexible behaviour

author: ian_dickinson
msg: Added convenience constructor to allow the arg handler to be specified at construct time
